忉利天: (とういりてん) - heaven of the thirty-three; one of the six heavens of the desire realm
忌: (ki/eu) - mourning , mourning, mourning period; anniversary of one's death
忌が明ける: (きがあける) - to come out of mourning
忌まわしい事件: (いまわしいじけん) - abominable incident
忌み: (いみ) - mourning/abstinence; taboo; religious purification; pure/holy
忌み嫌う: (いみきらう) - to detest; to abhor; to loathe
忌み日: (いみび) - unlucky day (according to astrology); (previously a) death anniversary; purification and fast day
忌み箸: (いみばし) - things prohibited by chopstick etiquette
忌み言葉: (いみことば) - taboo word; euphemism (used in place of a taboo word)
忌み詞: (いみことば) - taboo word; euphemism (used in place of a taboo word)
忌む: (いむ) - to avoid/to refrain from/to shun; (忌む, 諱む only) to detest
忌嫌う: (いみきらう) - to detest; to abhor; to loathe
忌寸: (いみき) - Imiki (fourth highest of the eight hereditary titles)
忌引: (きびき) - absence from work (school) due to mourning
忌引き: (きびき) - absence from work (school) due to mourning
忌憚のない: (きたんのない) - unrestrained; unreserved; candid; frank
忌日: (きじつ) - anniversary of a person's death (on which Buddhist commemorative rites, etc. are performed); 49th day after a person's death, on which Buddhist rituals are performed
忌言葉: (いみことば) - taboo word; euphemism (used in place of a taboo word)
忌詞: (いみことば) - taboo word; euphemism (used in place of a taboo word)
忌避: (kihi) - evasão, esquiva, fuga; recusação (de um juiz), objeção (a um juiz), impugnação
忍: (nin/shino) - endure , squirrel's foot fern (Davallia mariesii); Lepisorus thunbergianus (species of fern); color of clothing layers under one's overcoat (light green on blue)
忍の一字: (にんのいちじ) - Patience is the only way
忍ばせる: (しのばせる) - to conceal; to hide
忍び: (shinobi) - furtividade; furto furtivo, ladrão furtivo, furtividade; furto furtivo, ladrão furtivo; tolerância
忍びない: (しのびない) - cannot bring oneself (to do, etc.)
忍びの術: (しのびのじゅつ) - art of stealth (i.e. ninjutsu)
忍び会い: (しのびあい) - clandestine meeting; rendezvous; tryst; secret meeting (e.g. for lovers)
忍び入る: (しのびいる) - to steal or sneak or slip into
忍び六具: (しのびろくぐ) - (かぎ縄, 編み笠, 石筆, 三尺手ぬぐい, 薬, 打ち竹) the six tools of the ninja
忍び出し: (しのびだし) - sneaking out; creeping out
忍び出す: (しのびだす) - to sneak out; to creep out
忍び寄る: (しのびよる) - to creep; to steal up; to draw near unnoticed
忍び歩き: (しのびありき) - travelling incognito (traveling); quiet steps/creeping around
忍び泣く: (しのびなく) - to shed silent tears
忍び笑い: (しのびわらい) - stifled laugh; chuckling; snickering
忍び足: (しのびあし) - stealthy steps; soft steps
忍び込む: (しのびこむ) - to creep in; to steal in
忍び返し: (しのびがえし) - bamboo wall-top spikes (or wood, iron); spikes placed at the top of a wall to repel thieves
忍び逢い: (しのびあい) - clandestine meeting; rendezvous; tryst; secret meeting (e.g. for lovers)
忍ぶ: (しのぶ) - to conceal oneself/to hide; to endure
忍ぶ髷: (しのぶわげ) - women's hairstyle (first appearing during the mid-18th century)
忍会: (しのびあい) - clandestine meeting; rendezvous; tryst; secret meeting (e.g. for lovers)
忍受: (にんじゅ) - enduring and accepting; submitting (to)
忍容性: (にんようせい) - tolerability (e.g. of a drug dose)
忍摺: (しのぶずり) - clothing patterned using the fern Davallia mariesii
忍摺り: (しのぶずり) - clothing patterned using the fern Davallia mariesii
忍者屋敷: (にんじゃやしき) - ninja house; ninja residence
忍耐強い: (にんたいづよい) - persevering; very patient
忍耐心: (にんたいしん) - endurance; perseverance; patience
忍術: (にんじゅつ) - ninjutsu (fighting art of the ninja); ninja skills in secrecy, stealth and combat techniques
忍辱: (にんにく) - forbearance (in the face of difficulty, persecution, etc.)
忍込む: (しのびこむ) - to creep in; to steal in
忍返し: (しのびがえし) - bamboo wall-top spikes (or wood, iron); spikes placed at the top of a wall to repel thieves
忍髷: (しのぶわげ) - women's hairstyle (first appearing during the mid-18th century)
忖度: (そんたく) - surmise (about somebody's feelings); guess; conjecture
志: (estréia/mente/vontade) - intention , will, resolution, intention, ambition, aim, goal; kindness, goodwill, kind offer; gift (as a token of gratitude)
志ぐれ煮: (しぐれに) - seafood, etc. preserve made with mirin, ginger and soy
志す: (こころざす) - to plan; to intend; to aspire to; to set aims (sights on)
志っぽく: (しっぽく) - Chinese-style low dining table; Japanese-Chinese cuisine, served family-style (large dishes, diners help themselves), specialty of Nagasaki Chinese style low dining table; (often 志っぽく)  soba in soup with slices of boiled fish paste, shiitake mushrooms, greens, seaweed, etc.
志向: (shikou) - intenção, objetivo, preferência (por), orientação (para um objetivo)
志帥会: (しすいかい) - Shisui Faction (of the LDP)
志徳: (しとく) - Shitoku era (of the Northern Court) (1384.2.27-1387.8.23)
